content.detailedDescription: Tonight between 6:15 and 7:30 i filmed three different cylinder shaped objects that were flying in a zig zag pattern.I followed them for a while until they disappeared.We continue to see unusual objects in the sky on a weekly basis.They appear out of nowhere darting around disappearing and reappearing,zig zagging and such.
content.summary: Spotted  three objects that were cylinder shaped zig zagging through the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was talking to my nieghbor and looking at the moon and jupiter and mars talking about how they were alined when a starlike object appeared on the oppisite side of the moon it swelled in intensity larger than jupiter then faded as it flew south. it was so bright that i doubt it was the rotating reflection of a satilight. isaw the same thing again an hour later at 6:06 p.M. flying north.
content.summary: Bright star  increasing in intensity then faded away as it flew south.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out at the marine layer over the ocean from my rear deck when i observed an extremely fast moving contrail (much faster than other aircraft i have seen)the object made a sharp right angle turn further out to sea and disappeared.  this is  a no flight corridor as it is over the diableo canyon nuclear plant so i was amazed to see anything there!  the whole thing was gone in less than a minute, fortunately i had my camera in my shirt pocket as i was going to take a picture of the sunset.

this must be some new military craft as i am a pilot myself and i know no-one in his right mind would fly that corridor!
content.summary: Right angle turn, strange contrail in no fly zone.

content.detailedDescription:
my fiance debra robinson & i were travelling in her toyota corolla on the by-pass in olyphant, pennsylvania.  we came to a red light at the intersection, when we noticed a bright light in the sky. it appeared below the moon, which was crescent-shaped at the time.  at first we thought it was venus, but then it began moving.  it moved towards us, then receded.  it movet up and down, then left to right.  we noticed what appeared to be a black helicopter hovering in the sky across the road.  it appeared to be observing this object.
   we then traveled to our destination, wegman's supermarket in dickson city, pennsylvania.  we drove across the same section of road that i sighted two diamond-shaped ufo's in 2002.  when we reached our destination, at wegman's supermarket, we got out of the car, and i began taking pictures, 10 in all,  of this object with my cell phone camera.  the object appears as a small pinpoint of light on the camera's captured images, with the limited capabilities of this camera, even at full zoom range.  the object remained visible for about an hour, moving towards us, then receeding, moving up and down, left to right, as it did at the stop-light intersection.  the sky then began clouding, and it soon rained.  the object was then not visible throught the dense cloud cover.
   my fiance and i then travelled to our next destination, borders bookstore, near the viewmont mall, in dickson city, pennsylvania.  we remained there until 10:30 pm.  on our return trip to our home in jessup, pennsylvania, we were travelling down route 6 towards the town of eynon when we noticed a strange light in the sky.  at first we thought it was an airplane, but at times it remained motionless, then moved very slowly.  the object remained visible to us until we reacehed the town of peckville, when we lost sight of it.
   these are my sixth and seventh ufo sighting experiences, four i've had with my fiance debra.  six were in pennsylvania, one in florida.
   my fiance and i are searching for answers to these anpmalous ufo experiences, and the ufo phenomenon. 
   sincerely,
   [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: My fiance, debra robinson & i sighted a ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
While visiting relatives during the summer in the late 1960's or early 1970's, several members of my family witnessed a large glowing sphere in the sky on multiple occasions. i was about 8-10 years old at the time.

first, while walking her dog by the clearview expressway in bayside queens, my cousin saw the disc hovering over the street lights and she came running home screaming.
none of us believed her. 
it happened the next day to her as well.
the third day, when we came home from picking up pizza for dinner and stepped out of the car, we saw for ourselves.
the disc seemed very large, and was hovering over the street lights.
it was disc-shaped and had an overall glow. along the outer rim, there were smaller lights that glowed slightly stronger. the disc hocered for a minute or so, then seemed to bounce very slowly from side to side; a very low bounce. then it darted very quickly frim side ti side and then shot off at an extremely fast speed and was gone.

the srtangest thing about this was that my aunt told us not to talk about it, adn i had forgotten about the incident until about 4-5 years ago. my cousin that first saw the object is the only one still alive, and i asked her about it. she remembers as i do, we just don't speak about it much.
i remember being extremely frightened.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Glowing saucer hovering in sky in queens ny late 1960's early 1970's.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?I was riding in the car on a paper route with my grandmother and sister we pulled over so i could releve myself
 
2. what made you first notice the object? i first seen it in the sky siting there blinking 

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? i thought its was a plane and i watched it for a while

4. describe the object and its actions and motions.Its seemed like it wasa disc but i couldn't tell it was blinking, red,blue,green,white,purple,ornge

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. well at first i was thinking it was cool and i alwaysed wanted to see one but thin after i sit there for awhile i started to feel depressed all of a sudden and i got in the car and we started back on the road i never took my eyes off it for about 13 min 

6. how did you lose sight of the object?It lowered behind the trees

note: i have seen this same object three times sence then

nov 26,2008 3:30am - 3:45am
nov 30,2008 10:30pm - 10:55pm
dec  1,2008 11:00pm - 11:20pm
dec  1,2008 12:30pm - 12:40pm
content.summary: Blinking, red,blue,green,white,purple,orange.

content.detailedDescription: Witness,while walking home from her place of employment at 7:30 p.M., saw an airliner high overhead at what looked to be cruising altitude.  directly below the airliner she saw a group of what she considered to be six (6) white blinking lights at about 80 degrees up from the horizon, moving east to west/northwest in a somewhat rectangular formation, equidistant from one another, but with the lights changing positions as they all continued moving forward within the somewhat rectangular cluster/group/formation.  witness had the lights in view for approximately 25 seconds, and there was no sound. witness' estimate of speed is described simply as "very fast."  her perception is that the lights were lower than the airliner, but not as low as a light airplane might fly.
content.summary: Cluster of 6 lights moving e to w, changing positions as they progressed

content.detailedDescription:
I've attached the original video, and an edited for detail extraction video showing two ufos, and the pilots.

videos done in near infrared
content.summary: Several ufos pass overhead down 10 street nw, calgary alberta, canada

content.detailedDescription:
These photos were fowarded to me by a colleague from work, who in turn received them from his nephew, who is an aid worker for world vision in thailand. the first photo shows a disc like object in the sky, rather large when in contrast to the clouds, which it seems to be illuminating. i would have thought nothing about the image, as there are various factors that could have been involved as to how it appeared, etc. but, as i looked closer, i noticed the darker pixels on the bottom of the supposed object, forming what could be a wedge. also, the pixels are darker in the center, forming a small circle in the middle of the supposed object. i recall seeing that shape before, and surfed around you tube until i found it. it has similar features to the nasa sts75 supposed ufo video. 

a few moments later, another shot was taken, with no object in the sky, but the clouds still a bit illuminated. i understand an airport is located nearby, which might be an explanation. there was also a report of an explosion of an unidentified aircraft over viet nam on or around may 27th, 2008, a few days after these photos were taken.

as previously stated, i am a bit of a skeptic when it comes to ufo sightings over populous areas, especially in the vicinty of airports. but the shape of the object caught my attention, and i had to pass it along to the experts. 

witnesses are:


ms. heather ellison (photographer) 
   ms. samat mark 
   helper (no phone #)





hope to hear from you soon,

jeff woodward
content.summary: Disc shape appearing after illuminating clouds/wasn't visible with eye

content.detailedDescription: Every morning i see these faint stars moving slowly through the sky. i have to focus on a part of the sky and then i see them. this morning i saw 5 of them but one of them was moving through the sky when all of a sudden it glowed very bright(as bright as the sun) for about 5 seconds and then went back to a faint star look. it's not shooting stars i'm seeing i used to think it was satellites but this one to become that bright for about 5 seconds and then fade back to its original brightness and continue to move slowly through the sky made me question that.
content.summary: Look like faint stars moving through sky.

content.detailedDescription: Erie looking oval shaped object with greenish looking white lights in the center of the craft.I'am a 45 yr old goverment officer,my mother and i were out shopping and were on our way home when i looked up and saw an object that seemed to be hoovering in the sky a short distance away.I know my planes and helecopters and this was neither.We drove about a mile and a half and caught up with it.Upon closer inspection we could see that it had an oval shape to it,with greenish whit lights in the center.It seemed to reverse course as though it knew we were veiwing it.We were excited at first but then a little panic set in,it was wierd,i backed my jeep up out of the dead end street and left the scene,i even ran a red light,it no traffic at the time.I was always a believer but seeing this reinforced my belief.The whole event lasted about 13 min.
content.summary: Object moved slowly toward southeast,stoped momentarly,reversed course asn stoped.

content.detailedDescription: I was going out to toss some some trash in the garbage can and noticed a airplane perparing its landing procedure from the east and as i looked at it i saw a red light behind it, it had looked like it was following  the airplane but as it flew the red light looked like it was slowing down from it original speed then it just slowed down dramaticly as if it were still, as i observed it had beggun moving very slowley due south as it kept going it got brighter then it just went from on and off maybe around five times after it just kept going south after a few minutes it just flickered and went east at an outstanding speed as it speed it didnt disapper but it flickered till it just was gone, i wasnt nervous or anything but i was just that is a ufo i know how aircraft move and the certain lights they have,this was a red light just a light and was going to slow to be an aircraft and did not match any movements of a helicopter especilly when it flickered and speed off at amazing speed this was a ufo and many of my neighbors saw it as well it wont be surpising if many reports of this object arise here in south texas sadly my camera did not capture the object but this is my report i know plenty of aircraft and military crafts and this was not one.
content.summary: Bright red kept fluctuating.

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up at 5:15 on saturday, november 29 and looked out the bedroom windows that faced south.  i saw a bright white light that was very large, it appeared to have a halo around it in the ssw sky at about 1000. the light dimmed and started to fall.  i thought i observed the death of a star. however the object started bouncing all over the sky.  it looked like a lure might appear at the end of a fishing pole if a person was jigging. 
the movements were too jerky and unpredicatable to be any sort of aircraft that i am familiar with. i don't live anywhere near an airport.  i couldn't hear any sound as i was inside and the windows were closed. it had to be very high up in the sky.
i thought i was seeing things so i closed my eyes again.  i rubbed my eyes. i even got up and went to the bathroom and it was still there when i came back. 
i watched it for over 25 minutes. it did move westward but very slowly. 
it seemed as if it had some sort of headlight because as it was swinging and bouncing around, i could see that it lit up some wispy clouds that were in the sky. 
i could also see a red glow, like there might be a tail light, but i never did actually see a red light. 
i woke up two nights later, on monday, dec.1 at about the same time and saw the same "bouncing star". it didn't move as much this time.
content.summary: Star like object bouncing all over ssw sky. lighting up nearby clouds.

content.detailedDescription: While standing in front of my apartment i saw a bright light coming from the east, it was headed to the west. wasn't sure what it was so i began recording it. during the filming i noticed four sets of lights.  it was diamond shape, with lights at the front, sides and rear of the craft.  it was totally silent. it did not have the same light patterns of the airplanes that fly over at night.  all lights seemed to be the same color (bright white), the lights on the sides, were blinking.  totally differant from an airplane, which has diffreant color lights on the wings. i ended up losing it because i could not see it anymore. this is not the first time i have seen this craft in the austin skies. i keep wondering what it could be.
content.summary: December 1st light over austin.

content.detailedDescription:
Took my kids out to show them venus, jupiter, and the moons proximity to each other in the sky (i am am amateur astronomer). by the time we got out there they were too low on the horizon to view with the treeline where we were viewing from, but on the way out a triangle flew over top of us. 

it was characteristic of a plane at first aside from the fact that it was, first off, very low... i'd say 500-1000 ft. in the sky. it had 3 white lights projecting straight down making a perfect triangle. it was travelling at about the same speed i would expect to see a plane travelling at. no noise. it may have been making noise but we didn't hear it. the two lights that were where the wings would have been if it were a plane were solid white and the light at where the nose would have been was fading in and out fairly rapidly. it wasn't a flashing though... it was a slightly slower fade both in and out. otherwise, than the fading the nose light was identical to the wing lights. it flew straight overhead and out of sight with no change in speed or direction.

i wish i'd had a camera, but honestly i was so taken by it that even if i did i may not have taken a pic. was pretty weird... deff not a plane. my lucky day i guess =)
content.summary: Triangle flew low over the house, very distinct from airplanes that were also in the air...

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from bowling on a league from my work.I was driving north on niagara falls blvd it was a dark overcast night.I was a few miles from my house which at the time was 1254 pearce rd. town of wheatfield n.Y.The traffic at the time was very light,i noticed a blur like light on the drivers side of my car in the sky.I thought because it was overcast that it may be the moon.However,it seemed kind of low in the sky.As i turned right onto a road i lost sight of the light.I drove a ways and turned left onto pearce rd. the street i lived on.I did not see anything in the sky untill i pulled up in front of my house and stopped in the middle of the street as suddenly the light appeared in the sky directly in front of my car.I was stunned for a second then i became curious and stepped out of my car.I walked in front of my car as the light was small as i had first seen it.I knew it was in a different position and wondered how it got to above my street.For some reason i went to my car and blinked my headlights on and off a few times.Then i returned to the front of my car.The object grew in diameter very quickly and i fell back against my car hood as it appearred to be comming directly toward me.The object stopped and i could see it was cylindrical with a definite edge around it.Just inside the edge it had three tear drop shaped objects revolving "counter clockwise" within themselves,in a "clockwise direction and they moved together in sequence as they spun around.The center of the object had what i would describe as a smokey center like fog or smoke rotating and moving around slowly.I could hear no sound or see anything else.I ran next door to my neighbors mr. and mrs. james henderson and knocked on their door awaking them.They came to their door and i asked jim if he had binocculars,he returned with a telescope which i tried to steady on the top of his car but i was shaking too much and could not see anything else.Shortly after the object reverted back to the size it was when i first seen it.Then like a light being turned off it disappeared.When i settled down i called the niagara county sheriffs office and reported it.I also called nigara falls air force base and reported what i had seen.I'm not sure of the exact date and time but the report appeared in the tonawanda news on the front page shortly after.Also about two weeks later i received a phone call from a man who said he worked at speer carbin in lewiston n.Y.He claimed to be an engineer and said he was a investigator for nicap and asked if he could interview me.I agreed and he came to my residence.I drew the object for him and told him my story,he had me sign a paper stating that i had no objection to my account someday appearing in a book as he decribed it. thats all i have to offer,i hope there is some information that you find helpful.  sincerely ronald waliszewski.
content.summary: Returning home from work i spotted a blur like object in the sky,i pulled in front of my home and the object was in front of my car in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing at my sliding glass door (which faces south west) smoking a cigarett and i happend to look up and see a elongated triangular shape flying due north at very low level and very low speed. i would estimate the speed at 30-35 mph and the altitude at approximatly 150 feet. i could not take my eyes off of this object and had a cell phone that i could of taken pictures with but i did not think of it at the time. the craft had a concave on the very front of the thickest part of the elongated triangle and the strange thing about it was the fact that it was flying with the thick part of the wedge forward and the tip of the triangle aft. i must also note that the sky was grey that evening. the very tip of the aft section of the craft was bending up and down like a pair of diving flipers. i stepted out of the doorway and started to walk down my little walkway that runs alongside of my house (left and faceing east)to get a closer look at the craft, when the caft itself seemed to notice that i was looking at it, upon which the craft imediatly slid sideways on the horizontal (towards me ) without turning left or right and rotating up on its side where the complete shape of the craft changed. this startled me and i stopped walking towards the craft, because this black aura started to surrond the entire craft like it was angry that i was looking at it.  the way the craft looked at this time and how it behaved just blew my mind. it was now a big black circle surronded by a thin white line with like a blended thick set of wings with small cocaves at the tips of those wings and the big black cicle in the center was blacker than any black i have ever seen and was emminating an extra black aura all around the circle aimed right at me. when i had stopped walking towards the craft it had stopped moving towards me. the craft rotated back down as it started to pass by me and once agian the entire shap of the craft changed, it was now like two offset spheres, but the spheres were not completly round because the bottom portion was curved and the rest was a circle. the craft still was giving off an aura and i went to the end of my walkway to the chian link fence so that i could continue to watch the craft for as long as possible as it headed north and went ot of sight. this sighting has been on my mind every day since it happened and has troubled me ever since. the biggest impresion the craft has left on me is that we are not alone on this planet,that there is another entity here with us. i have never written to any about anything in my whole life, but i do need to talk with someone about this because i don't fell like the people around me believe me and this sighting has effected me in a strange way. the one thing that i fogot to mention is that this craft was so close to me and it never made a sound!                              gary morse
content.summary: Object jet black changing shape three different times with a black aura coming off object.

content.detailedDescription: Witness' daughter came home and told witness to look out the front window.  witness and wife proceeded to the front door and went out to the front yard.  witness had a clear view of the sky and saw three streaks of light about 45 to 90 degrees from the horizon approximately 3 to 4 miles behind normandy farms.  witness is a retired policeman who now works with this fi in a different department.  witness indicates he had never seen anything like that in the night sky.  when queried whether it was perhaps spotlights from a business, he indicated "no".  daughter and wife reportedly also saw the lights and they watched it for a few minutes.  the streaks of light varied in brightness and did not appear to touch the horizon.  witness thought the news told him it was ice crystals, but he did not agree with the observation.  witness and family were puzzled by the event and told this fi after watching the episode on the bc flap on the discovery channel.  witness and family eventually returned inside the house after a few minutes watching the spectacle.

My wife and i were on our way home from the mall we were heading south on rt 136 in warren ri whene my wike look up to see a slow moving triangular object in the sky. she said it had lights cirling around the mid section and red lights at the corners. i drove ahead to an opening where i could pull over but at that point it was way off in the distance. i watched till it went behind the trees. my wife is not a believer in ufos like i am but she is shaken by what she has seen.
content.summary: Large triangle shaped object with lights around the center and red lights at the corners.

content.detailedDescription: I believe i may have physical evidence left behind from an earlier encounter of this year. i have kept many detailed records of what happened. this whole situation is very complex and it appears to me that someone is trying to keep me from releasing what i have. i have contacted others about this and as soon as i start getting somewhere, progress comes to a halt. i do have some photos.
content.shape: Chevron,  Circle,  Cylinder,  Disc,  Fireball,  Flash,  Oval,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Triangle
content.summary: Too many events to list.

content.detailedDescription:
In 1964 i was 7 mos pregnant.  i got up from bed because i remembered i hadn't taken my water pill.  i noticed it was bright outside as i stood before the kitchen sink and i presumed there was a full moon.

suddenly the room started shaking.  i held onto the counter and it was over in seconds.  again, i presumed i had just experienced an earthquake.

i started back to bed when i noticed noise, a humming sound i couldn't ignore or locate.  i decided it was coming from outside and went to the front door and opened it.

suddenly there were bright lights in my eyes and i couldn't see.  i had to shield my eyes.  i presumed there had been an accident on the hill above but there were no sounds to match an accident.

when i could see again, there in front of me sat a flying saucer.  red, white and green lights blinked off and on in rhythm and the humming continued. i watched it for some time, walked toward it but became fearful and went through other mechinations i won't go into.

i've written this before but no one seems interested so i'm going to stop.  i saw it when i was 20 and now i'm almost 65.  there could have been missing time but i'm not sure.  on the off chance i might be able to learn something new i would ask that you refer me to someone near prescott, az who would be willing to hypnotize me to find out.  i am not a good subject and i tried once but became so fearful before each session that i quit.  the hypnotist said i had a "mental block."  do you know hypnotists who specialize in subjects like me?

the hypnotist i went to said he didn't believe in flying saucers and usually attributed such incidents to some kind of childhood trauma.  since he thought i was a nut case from square one i wasn't comfortable.  i quit after the third session.

all i want is a referral from someone i can trust.
content.summary: Disc landed in vacant lot beside my apartment and sat for some time.

content.detailedDescription:
Give me a call please.
727-536-3988.Kenneth.
content.summary: I was inside.

content.detailedDescription:
While stopped on the side of the road (off or rt 80) to take some photos of area. we notices a fleet of objects in the sky (moving from north(northeast) heading south(southwest) over 70 objects kept changing formation (mostly in pairs) forming half-circular shape to "l" shape and other random formations.

i was able to take several photos of the event with my professional 16.6 mega-pixel camera and a 100mm lens. even though objects are not 100% clear, once i zoom in on the image, i can come to a definite conclusion that these were un-winged objects (spheres).
content.summary: Multiple spheres moving and changing formation.

content.detailedDescription:
Object looked like a blinking star.  took out my video camera and saw that it was not a star but was a pulsating object that flared up and down.  a few times it looked like it would disappear but would then flare up and produce a red halo effect.  at one point a flashing light flew away from it to the left at high speed.

the following day i filmed an orb of light flying through the air

a few days later i filmed two strange looking objects at night.  one with three lights and one with two.  they were definitely not airplanes or helicopters.

i have video footage of all five objects and can be seen on youtube under alfie008.
content.summary: Object looked like a star that went from red to green.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home in my kitchen when i heard these jets outside.  at first i didn't pay too much attention to them, but they kept flying over and over. i then thought, what in the world is going on out there.  i went outside and was standing on my drive way looking for the jets when all of a sudden, here comes two round objects flying side by side. i thought, oh my god!  i watched then until they were out of site, then all of a sudden, here comes two more trailing behind the first two.  as far as i know, i was the only one to witiness the ufo's. there was know one else outside.
the objects were a good size, they were of a dull brown color, they were disc shaped and they were flying low. i lived in a different area of town at the time and we have several navy bases in the area.  one has been closed. these objects were coming from the the direction of the navy base that has closed. i don't remember when the base closed, but i think it was around the time, i witnessed the ufo's.
content.summary: Two ufo's flying side by side.

content.detailedDescription: After eating thanksgiving supper several relatives and i were outside of my mother-inlaws house talking ,when i noticed an airplane flying east ,then i noticed a blue object ,about the size of a dim star well above the plane dropping at a slight angle away from the plane ,maybe slightly faster than the plane was traveling, and when the blue object got even with the plane it made a 90 degree turn and started following the plane, it was only a few hundred feet behind the plane when the blue light went out. it happend so fast i didn't have time to get anyone else to look. the whole thing only lasted about 12 to 15 seconds.I was quite excited. this was my third ufo to see in my 50 years.
content.summary: Ufo descended and followed airplane.

content.detailedDescription:
El video lo tomo un amigo en una maana de cielo azul
utilizo una vieja camara sony, todo comenzo cuando un familiar miro hacia el cielo un objeto volador que se encontraba estatico, despues se trajo la camara y se filmo un rato, pero al revisar el video se vieron dos esferas que realizaron jiros de noventa grados a alta velocidad, alrededor del objato mas grande.

hay otro video, de un vecino, pero nunca lo he visto, solo comenta que se aprecian mejor las esferas.

el video lo pase a dvd pero no se como mandarlo.

si me escriben, vere la forma de enviarles una copia
bye
content.summary: Esferas que vuelan alrededor de un objeto volador.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my family were having a thanksgiving dinner for our immediate family and a few friends the day after thanksgiving. i stepped out front to light a cigerette standing in the middle of my front yard. after lighting up, i looked up in the the low cloud filled sky; like i tend to do, being a skywatcher like i am, i saw a light directly to my north start moving from east to west. right off the bat the hairs on my arm stood at attention. it seemed to be skipping the underside of the clouds, so the light was semi-obscured by the moisture vapor, a kind of halo around the light. it moved extremely fast for being as low as it appeared to be. i followed it with my eyes for about 3 seconds before it seemed to make a curving toward the south (now maybe a mile to my north-west) i yelled to my friend craig(33) to come outside. i of course turned my head into the house to communicate with him thinking maybe i won't be able to see it when i turned back around. as i turned scanning the sky like a desparate drug fiend looking for his next fix, i spotted it again, craig right on my tail. my oldest son tyler(16) followed out as well spotting what i saw, as i was beginning to not beable to see it anymore because the distance it had travelled in such a short amount of time. right after i lost sight of the object my son said, "it just shot to the left". craig; not seeing it initailly, was upset that he didn't catch a glimpse of it said, "i just saw it shoot straight up". we looked around for a while after, hoping this was the beginning of the "tucson lights" but it seems that nobody else has reported this event, yet! no sound accompanied this fly by as we realized right after the light went up in the sky (per craig, i or my son did not witness it going straight up but i really don't doubt it one bit.) i have been a sky watcher ever since i was a kid because of my interest in ufo's and have never reported anything like this before. this has affected me; in a way that truely makes me believe that what i saw was a special moment in my life. this was not a plane, balloon, or helicopter. i would believe you if investigations concluded that what i saw was "inteligentlly controlled ball lightning" but ball lightning, no.  *****i think that some of the local news channels have video recordings of tucson from 'a' mountain constantly scanning. ask them to see the video from the 28th at 6:27p.M.
content.summary: High speed curving light just under cloud layer, then shoots straight up.

content.detailedDescription:
In early december 1998, around 8 pm i witnessed a near noiseless aircraft fly by my at an extremely low altitude.  i was standing on my porch, situated approximately 15ft off the ground.  my house was positioned in a cauldesac which opened up on the left and curved at the right from where i was standing.  i was standing outside observing the moon, which was discoloured due to natural atmospheric phenomena when an unmarked aircraft flew by, in between the rows of houses, at high speed and only 15 to 25ft. above ground.  the aircraft continued down the street before climbing and turning left at which point i lost sight of it.  the aircraft made no engine noise and all i heard was the jet stream as it flew past.  the aircraft also had no lights.  as visibility was limited and the aircraft was moving too quickly and at such an angle for any detailed observation i was not sure of its shape although certain features made me think it may have been a sea harrier, and at the time i accepted it as that or some other military aircraft.  however, sea harriers are by no means noiseless, they are extremely loud aircraft, and there would be no reason for a military pilot to fly at such a low altitude in a suburban environment where any error would be catastrophic.  the fact that it was also flying without lights made little sense as well.  a few seconds after the aircraft left my line of sight i returned inside.

although this event took place almost exactly a decade ago and i'm sure it's of little use, i felt that i should report this event to experts in case it provides any information at all.
content.summary: Near noiseless aircraft flew by at extremely low altitude.

content.detailedDescription: We live in lakewood ranch fl, the object we saw was a circle flashing light object that hovered in the sky for over an hour, we called madill air force base, no aircraft were deployed, we called the faa tower at sarasota and they had not objects on radar. called manatee county sheriffs who arrived and confirmed object but had no idea what it was. after an hour it just disappeared
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Circle lighted object at 2400-2600 feet over the horizon.
